title: Vi-Ult bug
body: When Vi ults Sion and he directly also ults vi gets pulled over half the map (of course) but if vi gets (after being pulled over half the map) him and normally pulls him up, he just Keep running and vi does nothing, just stands on the other site of the map. Hope u fix this cause normally sion ult is interupted by other champs

replies.body: or do you mean by a enemy champ who gets hit
yes, normally when he hits a champ he stops, in this case vis ult animation starts, but she dont lift him up and her ult is just cancelled
